licence_overview:
$!Contact the council for written permission if you want to put advertising signs or displays on the road or pavement in Scotland.$!

##How to apply
Contact your council to apply for written permission for an advertising display.

^You may have to pay a fee.^

##Fines and penalties
If you put an advertisement sign or display on the street or pavement without permission, you can be fined up to £200, and £20 for each day that it stays there.
licence_short_description: Written permission if putting advertising signs or displays on the road or pavement.
